Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Thulsa's augmented his units with Ksharans. They must be taken out.

Kill the Ksharan {@LinkCreature:55#13#shadow archers}, {@LinkCreature:55#14#reavers}, {@LinkCreature:55#15#berserkers}, and {@LinkCreature:55#16#mystics}.

Report to Jola at Valumnir Outpost when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
